description.value:
Moradin grants the strength of the mountain and the toughness of iron to followers who win his favor. His blessing augments both body and mind, instilling bravery and toughness in his chosen.

Alternative Reward: Divine Boon - Uncommon

Property:

If an enemy pushes you, you can reduce the distance you are pushed by 2. If an enemy pulls you and that pull leaves you adjacent to that enemy, you can make a melee basic attack against that enemy as an opportunity action.

Trigger: You take damage.

Effect: Reduce the damage you take by 5.

Level 8: Reduce the damage by 8.

Level 13: Reduce the damage by 10.

Level 18: Reduce the damage by 15.

Level 23: Reduce the damage by 20.

Level 28: Reduce the damage by 25.
